form.text1:
The admissibility of your application will be verified by the Administration of foreigners in France
If your application is admissible, you will receive a confirmation notice telling you to complete the submission of your application
If your application is not admissible, we will tell you and you will specify the reason(s) element(s) missing where appropriate.
form.text2: During the visit to the Embassy of France in Seoul, the authenticity of your passport and your vital documents will be verified, and saved biometric data.
form.text3:
After the appointment, your case will be heard and you will be notified of the decision
If the decision is favorable and after flow of tourist taxes, you will be prompted. come and collect your residence permit when it is ready.
If the decision is unfavorable, you will have the opportunity to request an appeal.
